notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (CD-ROM, 1996).
This item appears at reel 1714:21 as Wing D1789A (number has no entry in CD-ROM 1996 ed.), and at reel 2609:3a as Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) D1788A.

Imperfect: copy at reel 1714:21 torn, stained and tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of text. Improved copy at reel 2609:3a bound and filmed preceding Wing (2nd ed.) B1237A Baxter, R. Dattodiad y qwestiwn mawr ... Llundain, 1693.
Reproduction of originals in Harvard University Library and Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales, Aberystwyth, Wales.
